values:
I got quite used to feeling I lived where things were happening, with all those years of living in London, within striking distance of London or in NYC. I can get quite annoyed with myself for navigating to a place that makes it as hard to get to decent live music as I now find myself.

So it's nice to remind myself once in a while that quality rather than quantity is what counts and I do have stuff to look forward to! A steady pace of one a month will suffice to cheer me up.
